colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @007A *, ,(CES PA 'DI NI GSER 'OD GA-YANG SKYABS KYI NOR LHA RNAMS LA BSANGS MCHOD 'BUL TSUL BSAM PA'I DON GRUB ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI DGE BA'I PHYOGS SU DMIGS NAS PE CING LA 'GRO BA'I LAM DU PHYI NANG BAR CHAD THAMS CAD ZHI NAS, ,DON GRUB SLAD DU MER GENG DGE TSUL ZHES @007B BYA BAS, ,GSER 'OD GA-YANG SKYABS KYI NOR LHA RNAMS BSANGS MCHOD 'BUL NA LAM GYI BAR ZHI BAR 'GYUR RO ZHES GSUNGS PA LA RKYEN BYAS STE, DGE SLONG MKHAS DBANG DAR HAN NANG SO 'DI LTA BU DGOS ZHES BSKUL BA'I NGOR, SLOB MA'I THA SHAL DU SU MA TE AARTHA SIDHI MING CAN GYI SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI HUR TSA PI LIG THU THO YON SHES RAB BO, ,BSANGS BTAB PA'I NYI MA NI, TSE BRGYAD BCU BZHI BCO LNGA NYER BZHI NYER LNGA BTAB BO, ,SARBA MANGGA LAm, ,)
author_simple: SU MA TI AARTHA SIDDHI MING CAN,
